parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Closes given display with exit code. It does not instantly close the display but does it on next simulation cycle. Most common exit codes are:
<ext><name>syntaxhighlight</name><attr> lang="cpp"</attr><inner>
#define IDC_OK		1 // emulate "OK" button
#define IDC_CANCEL	2 // emulate "Cancel" button
</inner><close></syntaxhighlight></close></ext>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Sometimes when one display is opened on top of another display, previous display may not close properly, i.e. some display EHs such as "onUnload" may never fire. Use this command to manually handle such displays.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> display [[closeDisplay]] exitCode

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> display: [[Display]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> exitCode: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_display [[closeDisplay]] 1;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>#define IDC_OK 1
_display [[closeDisplay]] IDC_OK;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[createDisplay]], [[closeDialog]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
